name: The Shifting Rooms
description:
CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD: 

WASD: 

Movement. 

Left Click: Fire Gun. 

R: Reload

Numbers 1-4: Buy things at vending machines. 

Spacebar (Hold): Reset Time.

Q-E: Cycle Weapons.

CONTROLLER: 

Left Stick: Movement. 

Right Stick: Aiming. 

Right Trigger: Fire Gun. 

X: Reload

D-Pad: Buy items at vending machines. 

Y (Hold): Reset.

Right Bumper/Left Bumper: Cycle Weapons.

We have uploaded a new version where the weapons are 50% off! called the On Sale version! Enjoy!

In this retro-themed game, you are stuck in a shifting office building, and you always find yourself back in the starting room when you die, or run out of time.

Story: You’ve been casing this office block for a while now. As you break in, alarms go off, guards rushing around, and A strange man in a lab coat runs away. You grab the closet thing you can find, An hourglass. Odd. You find yourself in a small room, with a large, locked door to your left, with 3 padlocks on it. There is also a series of rooms to your right. You will have to fight your way through the rooms, get to the boss, and take his key. After each boss is killed, the journey will get longer and harder. Good luck.
